summary: CONSUMER STATES THAT SHE HAS SEVERAL COMPLAINTS ABOUT HER MERCEDES BENZ TRUCK, ONE BEING THAT THE TRUCK WILL NOT HOLD AN ALIGNMENT, WHICH CAUSES HER TIRES TO WEAR OUT FAST.  SECOND ONE IS THAT THE DOOR LOCK REGULATOR DOES  NOT WORK AND THE THIRD IS THE POWER STEERING FAILURE.  IT FAILED AT 24,000 MILES CAUSING IT TO BECOME IMPOSSIBLE TO STEER THE TRUCK.  SHE ALSO SAYS THAT THE TRUCK LEAKS POWER STEERING FLUID.         TS
